thread.title: Trump, May to discuss UK nerve gas attack, Russia suspected

title: Trump, May to discuss UK nerve gas attack, Russia suspected
text:
Trump, May to discuss UK nerve gas attack, Russia suspected 12:46pm EDT - 00:43 
U.S. President Donald Trump said he planned to talk to British Prime Minister Theresa May on Tuesday about the nerve agent attack in Salisbury, England, that struck down a former Russian double agent who passed secrets to British intelligence. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
